MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY16 and SY21 postcode areas of Newtown and Welshpool, affecting properties in a widespread area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.01PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to repair the fault on our network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.06PM on 11th March 2021.
